title: Scenario Configuration
description: Schema for the scenario configuration and scenario settings.

initial_select.description: Initial selection of model version, scenario group, and year.

modVersion.description: The version of the model used for the selection.

scnGroup.description: The scenario group, such as 'Base' or 'RTP'.

scnYear.description: The year associated with the scenario.

initial_select_compare.description: Comparison selection of model version, scenario group, and year.

modVersion.description: The version of the model used for comparison.

scnYear.description: The year for the comparison scenario.

models.description: List of models and their associated geojson files.

geojsons.description: Geojson files related to different geographical divisions.

taz.description: The geojson file for Traffic Analysis Zones (TAZ).

distSml.description: The geojson file for small districts.

distMed.description: The geojson file for medium districts.

distLrg.description: The geojson file for large districts.

distSup.description: The geojson file for super districts.

trends.description: List of trends with their codes and display settings.

scnTrendCode.description: Code representing the trend (e.g., RTP, Needs, NoBuild, etc.).

displayByDefault.description: Indicates if the trend should be displayed by default.

scenarios.description: List of scenarios with their details and associated trends.

modVersion.description: The version of the model associated with the scenario.

scnGroup.description: The scenario group (e.g., Base, TIP, RTP, Needs, NoBuild, etc.).

scnYear.description: The year associated with the scenario.

scnFullName.description: The full name of the scenario, usually combining version, group, and year.

alias.description: An alias or short name for the scenario.

scnTrendCodes.description: List of trend codes associated with the scenario.
